TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReadOnlySpan`1<T> extends System.ValueType
generic <typename T> public value class ReadOnlySpan

span.span: The type of items in the .

summary.span: 提供任意内存的连续区域的类型安全和内存安全只读表示。

span.span: Provides a type-safe and memory-safe read-only representation of a contiguous region of arbitrary memory.

remarks.format: `ReadOnlySpan` 是[ref 结构](~/docs/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types.md#ref-struct-type)，在堆栈上分配和可以永远不会转义至托管堆。`ReadOnlySpan` is a [ref struct](~/docs/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types.md#ref-struct-type) that is allocated on the stack and can never escape to the managed heap. Ref 结构类型有多种限制，以确保它们不能托管堆，包括，它们不能进行装箱，分配给类型的变量的 lambda 表达式中捕获到提升、 分配给`dynamic`变量，并它们不能实现任何接口类型。Ref struct types have a number of restrictions to ensure that they cannot be promoted to the managed heap, including that they can't be boxed, captured in lambda expressions, assigned to variables of type , assigned to `dynamic` variables, and they cannot implement any interface type. 一个`ReadOnlySpan`实例通常用于引用数组的元素或数组的一部分。A `ReadOnlySpan` instance is often used to reference the elements of an array or a portion of an array. 一个数组，但是，与`ReadOnlySpan`实例可以指向托管内存，本机内存，或上管理的内存堆栈。Unlike an array, however, a `ReadOnlySpan` instance can point to managed memory, native memory, or memory managed on the stack.

remarks.format: 此方法是很危险因为它**不会检查**错误满足以下条件：This method is dangerous because it **does not check** for the following error conditions: - `length` 参数不正确。The `length` parameter is incorrect. - `obj` 参数为 null。The `obj` parameter is null. - 对象`obj`指向可能包含原始指针。The objects `obj` points to may contain a raw pointer.

remarks.format: 如果`source`并`destination`重叠，整个`source`像它已将复制到临时位置复制到前处理`destination`。If the `source` and `destination` overlap, the entirety of `source` is handled as if it was copied to a temporary location before it is copied to `destination`. 如果`destination`长度小于`source`、 不复制任何项，并且该方法返回`false`。If the `destination` length is shorter than `source`, no items are copied and the method returns `false`.
